title: Enhancing Scientific Learning Competency Using Quality Cost Information

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific concepts and basic quality management terminology
context.additional_context: Content optimized for smartphone-based learning environments, with modular learning sessions of 10-15 minutes daily

learning_goals: Learners can explain diagnostic applications of Quality Cost Information (QCI) and apply them to real-world cases
Learners can categorize and explain interactive information analysis processes for quality improvement into at least three stages
Learners can propose quality improvement measures with at least 80% accuracy based on data collected via mobile learning platforms

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
